text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I'm so sorry everyone. I've shown you all something so shameful…

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Oye, oye, why're you apologizing? You didn't cause any issues for us, ya know?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Plus the Japan Cup has some pretty amazing racers from around the globe in it. Coming in 4th ain't that bad.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
text_block_list.text: Y-Yeah! The way you ran today was just as mesmerizing as usual, McQueen-san!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Anyways, now that the race is over why don't we have Trainer treat us to something yummy? That won't be a problem, will it Trainer?
N-Nope! Not a problem at all! McQueen, feel free to eat as much as you want now that the Japan Cup is over!
N-Nope! Not a problem at all! McQueen, feel free to eat as much as you want now that the Japan Cup is over!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I'm… going to have to refuse.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I have to prepare for the Arima Kinen and I just finished that race, so I'm not hungry.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Ah, I have to call Grandmother as well. I'll be taking my leave then.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Everyone, I'm… I'm so sorry for today…

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: That felt real forced… Anyways, you're real bad at acting, ya know?
I'm sorry. I tried my best, but…
I'm sorry. I tried my best, but…
I was upset with myself for being unsure whether or not I should call out to her or just leave her alone for a while.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I apologize for the intrusion.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Ohh! If it isn't Oguri! Did you come to cheer on McQueen!?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I came to see how the members of my former team were doing.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: But it doesn't seem like the star of the show is here.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Hmm… it seems like something happened. So what is it?
I decided to tell Oguri Cap everything that had happened.
I decided to tell Oguri Cap everything that had happened.
It began with the danger of our team being dissolved, and how we overcame that, which also brought in more members.
Due to the lowering of her placement in the much anticipated Spring Tenno Sho, she thought that this race was her chance to redeem herself. However, she ended up finishing in 4th place.
Currently, Mejiro McQueen is like a machine with cogs that don't work together.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I see… I think I understand how McQueen is feeling.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: She is probably thinking that she has to live up to all of the expectations placed on her.
Live up to all of the expectations…?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: I have been there myself.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Having good results in your races breeds high expectations. Inevitably, you end up being tied down by said expectations…

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: And as these expectations grow they start feeling like obstacles to forward progress.
These expectations begin feeling like obstacles…
The only reason that this team is here today is thanks to Mejiro McQueen's efforts.
Every member of our team joined because of Mejiro McQueen's successes, and the only reason that they continue to run is because of their admiration for her.
And it isn't only the team members. I too was delighted by Mejiro McQueen's performance in her races, and because of that I've always had high expectations of her.
And it isn't only the team members. I too was delighted by Mejiro McQueen's performance in her races, and because of that I've always had high expectations of her.
Mejiro McQueen understood all of this, and as such struggled to live up to these expectations, alone.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: During times like this it's your job as a trainer to turn these expectations into strength, not into obstacles.
Turn these expectations into strength…
Oguri… How did you turn expectations into strength? What did Sensei do to help?
Oguri… How did you turn expectations into strength? What did Sensei do to help?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Hmm, while I wouldn't mind telling you…

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: You and McQueen have a relationship that is unique to you two.

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Doing it the same way we did would have no meaning to it… or at least that's what I think…
A relationship… that is unique to us…
A relationship… that is unique to us…
While I lack the experience and skill that Sensei had, Mejiro McQueen has always respected me as her trainer.
While I lack the experience and skill that Sensei had, Mejiro McQueen has always respected me as her trainer.
Why does Mejiro McQueen have so much faith in me? And what can I do for her…?
Why does Mejiro McQueen have so much faith in me? And what can I do for her…?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Hehe, that immediate reply… You really haven't changed since your days as a sub-trainer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: You've always put us before yourself.
I see. That's all I can do. Staying by her side, believing in her, and supporting her no matter what happens is all I can do!
choice_data_list: I'm going to go look for McQueen!

text_block_list.text: I see. That's all I can do. Staying by her side, believing in her, and supporting her no matter what happens is all I can do!
choice_data_list: I'm going to go look for McQueen!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hmm… Guess I'll take a look around the shopping district, the road to campus, and in front of the train station.

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Straight-cut Bangs
text_block_list.text: I'll go check if McQueen-san is somewhere on campus!

text_block_list.name: Droopy-eyed Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: I'll go and check around the race course!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl with Black Bob-cut
text_block_list.text: Then I'll go and check around the shrine.
This time, our team's ace will rely on us!
This time, our team's ace will rely on us!
